lead_paragraph: SLOAN--Marion. Marion Baker (Muffit) Sloan, of New York City, formerly of Rumson, NJ, passed away on June 17, 2016, age 59. Marion was the daughter of Samuel Sloan III and Marion Dryden Baker Sloan. She graduated from Rumson Country Day School, Choate-Rosemary Hall and Syracuse University. She was the sister of Cynthia Titus Powers of So Royalton, VT, Dorothy Titus McFeeters of Boston, MA and Ellen Sloan Nicholson of Savannah, GA. She was predeceased by parents and brothers Jay deWitt Titus and Samuel Sloan Jr. Services will be at St Georges by the River, Rumson, NJ, on July 6 at 10:00am. Interment will follow at FairView Cemetery in Middletown, NJ. Thompson Memorial Homes, Red Bank, NJ, is handling the funeral services. 1/3
